entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Saguenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
